programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Step into the stylish world of the Suit & Uniform Styles Playlist! This collection features K-pop hits where artists rock sharp suits, dashing uniforms, and bold fashion choices that elevate their performances. From sleek suits to trendy uniforms, these iconic outfits add extra charm to each track. It’s the perfect mix of music, style, and swagger — a playlist that’s as fashionable as it is energetic! (Track List: Moonbyul - Eclipse / WJSN - As You Wish / MONSTA X - DRAMARAMA / Red Velvet - Bad Boy / THE BOYZ - The Stealer / X1 - FLASH / SEVENTEEN - Clap / Golden Child - Fanfare / APRIL - LALALILALA / NCT U - BOSS / EVERGLOW - Adios / RIIZE - Boom Boom Bass / ATEEZ - Wonderland / Dreamcatcher - Scream / NU'EST - BET BET / Stray Kids - Thunderous / SF9 - RPM / EXO-K - Overdose / GFRIEND - Sunrise / WOODZ - Love Me Harder / MONSTA X - Love Killa / Chungha - Gotta Go / Highlight - Not The End / tripleS AAA - Generation / PENTAGON - Daisy / WJSN THE BLACK - Easy / CRAVITY - Flame / Dreamcatcher - Black Or White / VERIVERY - Get Away / GFRIEND - Crossroads / fromis_9 - Escape Room / SEVENTEEN - HOME / Lovelyz - Obliviate / BTOB - Missing you / IZ*ONE - Fiesta / ONF - Beautiful Beautiful / BTOB - MOVIE / BTOB - Blowin' up / Weki Meki - OOPSY / SEVENTEEN - Just do it / Red Velvet - Red Flavor / IZ*ONE - Spaceship)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: The Fresh Love Stage Compilation playlist captures the sweet and fluttering emotions of first love with its charming selection of songs. Filled with youthful and refreshing tracks, it perfectly embodies the excitement and tenderness of new romantic feelings. This playlist is designed to transport you to those heartwarming moments of infatuation and joy, offering a delightful musical experience that celebrates the essence of first love. programme.title: Golden Disc Awards
programme.sub-title: Golden Disc Awards: S1 E19 - Best Stage Compilation
programme.desc: Experience the star power of K-pop as the Golden Disc Awards presents a mesmerizing collection of the most electrifying performances. From BLACKPINK and Stray Kids to ITZY and TXT, these trailblazing artists will leave you stunned with their incredible vocals, impeccably sharp choreography, and undeniable charisma. Prepare to be dazzled! Witness the hottest K-pop acts light up the stage at the Golden Disc Awards. programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Experience the refreshing vibe of summer with the "Essential Summer Soundtrack". From the thrill of road trips to the warmth of sunlit days, this playlist brings summer to life through music. With upbeat energy, catchy choruses, and breezy rhythms, each track captures the essence of what makes K-pop summers unforgettable. Let the music carry you into your own sun-drenched story.
